title: Harriet and the Piper
production_companies: Louis B. Mayer Productions; Anita Stewart Productions, Inc.
cast_members: Anita Stewart|Ward Crane|Charles Richman|Myrtle Stedman|Margaret Landis|Byron Munson|Loyola O'Connor|Irving Cummings|Barbara La Marr

media.title: Harriet and the Piper (1920) - 4.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film Harriet and the Piper (1920) with Anita Stewart, the other actors are not identified, on page 103 of the October 9, 1920 Exhibitors Herald.
media.attribution: Anita Stewart Productions / Louis B. Mayer Productions / Associated First National Pictures

media.title: Harriet and the Piper (1920) - 1.jpg
media.caption: Still from the production of Harriet and the Piper (1920) with actress Anita Stewart seated and reading the script, producer Louis B. Mayer, director Bertram Bracken, actors Ward Crane and Charles Richman, Stewart's actor husband Rudolph Cameron, and screenwriter Monte M. Katterjohn, on page 43 of the June 12, 1920 Exhibitors Herald.
media.attribution: Anita Stewart Productions / Louis B. Mayer Productions / Associated First National Pictures

media.title: Harriet and the Piper (1920) - 5.jpg

media.attribution: Anita Stewart Productions / Louis B. Mayer Productions / Associated First National Pictures
